attributes.action: Close universities down for an appropriate amount of time amidst COVID19.
attributes.additional_details: We would like the Government or Parliament to enforce this action due to the growing fear among parents and students that attend school. The ability to focus or concentrate is affected in addition to the growing fears of the Coronavirus. In our view, the government and health officials around the world are more 'reactive' rather than 'proactive'. This will result in more spread as time is given for the virus to do so. We hope to come to an agreement as soon as possible in a timely manner.
attributes.background: Please close the universities across the UK for an appropriate amount of time to stop the spread of COVID-19.
